activity.title: openfoodfacts/openfoodfacts-explorer#425
activity.text:
**Issue Found:**
The `GreenScore` component crashes when receiving unexpected grade values because it tries to access styles for grades that don't exist in the `GRADE_MAP`.

**Fix Implemented:**
1. Added safe grade fallback: `grade?.toLowerCase() || 'unknown'`
2. Added style fallback: `GRADE_MAP[normalizedGrade] ?? GRADE_MAP.unknown`

**Result:**
Now when a bad grade comes in:
- It automatically uses the "unknown" style (gray background)
- No more crashes from undefined values
- Still shows meaningful output instead of breaking

**Before:** Crash on invalid grades  
**After:** Shows gray "unknown" badge for invalid grades

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/e2ddc31e-2957-4276-a4d3-b5401f88ddf0)

if this is correct, i can make a PR.

![image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/2fd7960f-de53-46e7-a686-99e2e17d0945)

- Maintained rotation button behavior to only appear when an actual image is present
- Improved layout to ensure consistent sizing and positioning of both actual images and placeholders
